name: part_002
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel and Tsunomaki Watame performing the opening chorus of 'Yumekui'.
Verse 1 dance sequence on a starry stage.
Bridge section leading into the final chorus.
Final chorus and outro with confetti.

subtitles.original: 僕は今　夢旅の中
subtitles.english: I am currently in the middle of a dream journey,

subtitles.original: あの星の島までも　飛んでゆける
subtitles.english: able to fly even to that island of stars.

subtitles.original: 手のりうたうたう　僕のユメクイ
subtitles.english: My hand-sized singing Dream Eater,

subtitles.original: 君のそばにも　たどり着ける
subtitles.english: can find its way to your side as well.

subtitles.original: 最初に描いた　夢を思い出せなくなって
subtitles.english: Becoming unable to recall the dream I first sketched,

subtitles.original: 頭の輪　大人になったから
subtitles.english: because the halo over my head has grown up.

subtitles.original: 右か左かで　いつまでも迷って
subtitles.english: Lost forever between right and left,

subtitles.original: 太陽が反転するまで　喋り込んだ
subtitles.english: we talked until the sun turned around.

subtitles.original: ひとつだけ　ポケットに入れてきたもの
subtitles.english: Just one thing I brought in my pocket,

subtitles.original: 大きな　この愛を持って
subtitles.english: holding onto this big love.

subtitles.original: 僕は今　夢旅の中
subtitles.english: I am currently in the middle of a dream journey,

subtitles.original: あの星の島までも　飛んでゆける
subtitles.english: able to fly even to that island of stars.

subtitles.original: 手のりうたうたう　僕のユメクイ
subtitles.english: My hand-sized singing Dream Eater,

subtitles.original: 君のそばにも　たどり着ける
subtitles.english: can find its way to your side as well.

subtitles.original: カラフルなモヤに　心を奪われ
subtitles.english: With my heart stolen by a colorful haze,

subtitles.original: ちょっとしたことに　躓いた
subtitles.english: I stumbled over something trivial.

subtitles.original: 擦りむいたとこに　君がくれたのは
subtitles.english: What you gave me for where I scraped myself,

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしいくらいの　可愛らしい絆創膏
subtitles.english: was an embarrassingly cute bandage.

subtitles.original: 叶える度に　食いつくすユメクイ
subtitles.english: The Dream Eater that devours every time a wish is granted.

subtitles.original: 叶える度に　また夢を見る
subtitles.english: Every time it's granted, I dream again,

subtitles.original: いくつになっても
subtitles.english: no matter how old I get.

subtitles.original: 僕は今　夢旅の中
subtitles.english: I am currently in the middle of a dream journey,

subtitles.original: 寄り道して　プレゼントを見つける
subtitles.english: taking a detour to find a present.

subtitles.original: 手のりうたうたう　僕のユメクイ
subtitles.english: My hand-sized singing Dream Eater,

subtitles.original: 描いた未来に　君がいつもいる
subtitles.english: You are always there in the future I sketched.

subtitles.original: 僕は今　夢旅の中
subtitles.english: I am currently in the middle of a dream journey,

subtitles.original: あの星の島までも　飛んでゆける
subtitles.english: able to fly even to that island of stars.

subtitles.original: 手のりうたうたう　僕のユメクイ
subtitles.english: My hand-sized singing Dream Eater,

subtitles.original: 君のそばにも　たどり着ける
subtitles.english: can find its way to your side as well.

subtitles.original: 君のそばで　ずっと夢を見る
subtitles.english: By your side, I will dream forever.
